p: Fresh leaves of H. arborescens were collected in June, 2019, on a site located on latitude 32°47′50.4″ S and 26°52′41.8″ E along Hogsback road, Alice Town, Eastern Cape, South Africa. The plant was authenticated by Prof. Cupido, a taxonomist in the Department of Botany, University of Fort Hare, and a voucher specimen (Abif2019/03) was deposited in the Giffen herbarium.
